articles.title: Tupperware shares plunge as it warns of possible collapse - BBC
articles.description: The 77-year-old food storage business is facing a bleak future as it races to secure new financing.
articles.content:
Tupperware, the US maker of food storage containers, has warned that it could go bust unless it can quickly raise new financing.
The 77-year-old firm said there was "substantial doubt about its abil… [+5099 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: PC shipments fell sharply last quarter, with Apple among hardest hit - The Verge
articles.description: Worldwide shipments of desktops and laptops suffered a drop of around 30 percent in the first quarter of 2023. IDC reports a drop of 29 percent to 56.9 million units, while Canalys reports a drop of 32.6 percent to 54 million units.
articles.content:
